little-rock.neighborhoods: Downtown, Hillcrest, River Market, The Heights, Woodland Hills, Chenal
little-rock.meetingHighlights: Robust downtown and neighborhood meetings with active River Market groups and regular speaker meetings.
little-rock.transitInfo: CARTS and Rock Region Metro provide local transit; Clinton National Airport (LIT) serves the metro.

fort-smith.areaDescription: Fort Smith metropolitan area, Arkansas River Valley
fort-smith.neighborhoods: Downtown Fort Smith, Chaffee Crossing, Northside, Rogers Avenue corridor
fort-smith.meetingHighlights: Border-city recovery with meetings serving Arkansas and Oklahoma; strong Big Book tradition; active evening meetings.
fort-smith.transitInfo: Fort Smith Transit provides local bus service; Fort Smith Regional Airport (FSM); close to I-40 and I-540.

fayetteville.neighborhoods: Downtown Fayetteville, Dickson Street, University of Arkansas area, Wilson Park
fayetteville.meetingHighlights: College-town recovery community with young people's meetings; diverse schedule near U of A campus; growing metro area.
fayetteville.transitInfo: Ozark Regional Transit buses; Northwest Arkansas Regional Airport (XNA) serves the region.

jonesboro.neighborhoods: Downtown Jonesboro, Highland Park, Stadium Boulevard, Johnson Avenue
jonesboro.meetingHighlights: Regional hub for recovery in Northeast Arkansas; college-area meetings near A-State; welcoming community atmosphere.
jonesboro.transitInfo: Limited local transit; Jonesboro Municipal Airport (JBR); US Highway 49 and 63 access.
